Package src

Class ChunkManager

java.lang.Object
src.ChunkManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameVariables
public class ChunkManager extends Object implements GameVariables
ChunkManager loads and holds the chunks that will be used in the game. The chunks are basically building blocks of the level.
Since:
March 2, 2024
Author:
Nick Clouse, Andrew Denegar, Molly O'Connor
See Also:
  • Chunk

      public ChunkManager()

  • Method Details

    • loadLevel

      public boolean loadLevel(int levelNum)
      Loads the level from levelNum and creates a 2D array of chunks, which represent each chunk of the maze.
      Parameters:
      levelNum - the level to load.
      Returns:
      true if the level was loaded correctly.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the ChunkManager.

    • updateCoords

      public void updateCoords(int dx, int dy)
      Update the coordinates of all chunks, add to activeChunks if visible.
      Parameters:
      dx - change in the x-coordinate.
      dy - change in the y-coordinate.

    • endFound

      public boolean endFound()
      Returns:
      true if the end has been found.

    • containsPlayer

      public boolean containsPlayer(Chunk c, PositionBlock pb)
      Returns true if the player is in the given block, same idea used for collisions.
      Parameters:
      c - Chunk to check for collision.
      pb - PositionBlock to check for collision.
      Returns:
      true if there is a full collision.
      See Also:
      • Chunk.collision(PositionBlock)

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d)
      Calls each chunk to draw itself.
      Parameters:
      g2d - 2D graphics to draw on.

    • checkCollision

      public List<GameVariables.Collision> checkCollision()
      Checks all active chunks for collision between walls and the player, returns a list of collisions which represent what side of the player is colliding, if any.
      Returns:
      list of collisions that denote the direction of the collision or NO_COLLISION.

    • getChunks

      public Chunk[][] getChunks()
      Returns:
      All chunks in the level.

    • getActiveChunks

      public List<Chunk> getActiveChunks()
      Return a list of the chunks that appear on the screen.
      Returns:
      the list of chunks that are visible on the screen.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method
      Parameters:
      args - arguements passed
